titles.title: Port Chicago Naval Magazine National Memorial Study Act

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a special resource study to determine whether it is suitable and feasible to include the Port Chicago Naval Magazine National Memorial as a unit of the National Park System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 3/12/2002--Introduced. Port Chicago Naval Magazine National Memorial Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) conduct a special resource study to determine the suitability and feasibility of including the Port Chicago Naval Magazine National Memorial as a unit of the National Park System; and (2) examine potential links between the Memorial and other World War II home front sites in the San Francisco Bay area.
